interestingcomments.content: Sony A7RIII or A7III? /!/ I've been looking to upgrade and all week I've researched what Sony I should buy. Is the A7RIII gonna last me longer than the A7III? Honestly I was looking towards the A7RIV but 61mp is a bit overkill for me and will just make file management harder. I'd rather just use the money towards some glass. I like the extra resolution the A7RIII brings but literally everyone is going nuts over the A7III. Whichever it is, I was going to pair it with the Zeiss Planar T\* 1.4/50, and the Sigma 14-24mm F2.8 Art. Thanks for any feedback, really appreciate it.
